overview:
Sudeep currently works in Global Banking & Markets at Royal Bank of Scotland. Prior to joining he was working in Global Wealth and Investment Management Technology at Bank of America. Previously worked as an insurance consultant for one of the largest Property & Casualty Insurer is USA. He has worked on Microsoft technologies (.Net/WCF)

His focus is always on enhancing the business by giving a competitive edge to his client.

Technology has always attracted him, so whenever a new technology hits the market, he makes sure he has hands-on with it.
